name: wordpress-plugin
description: Boilerplate WordPress Plugin structure to support development of JavaScript frameworks: React, Vue, Vanilla, TypeScript, supporting Vite, NextJS, Nuxt, Gatsby, and JSX/TSX Components (like MUI), CSS (like Tailwind + Unity), data APIs (like REST and GraphQL). Supports TSC, ESLint + Prettier code definitions and formatting standards.
author: Marty McGee
